decryption-error.own-key-incorrect: Failed to decrypt message (Your key is incorrect)
decryption-error.their-key-incorrect: Failed to decrypt message (They have an incorrect key)

attachment.sticker-added-to-my-stickers: Sticker added to your stickers successfully

chat-list.rotate-key-confirm: Are you sure you want to rotate the key?
chat-list.leave-dm-confirm: Are you sure you want to leave this DM? You can not re-join it (only create a new one) and the other user will still be able to see all old messages

info-bar.confirm-remove-user: Are you sure you want to remove @{username} from the group?
info-bar.invalid-file-type: Selected file is not an image

chat.offline-message: You may not see all messages in this chat
chat.failed-to-select-last-chat: Failed to load you last selected chat
chat.create-chat-content: What type of chat would you like to create?

dm.not-verified-content: User @{username} is not verified. You need to verify with them once before creating a chat with them.

group.not-verified-content: Users @{usernames} are not verified. You need to verify with them once before creating a chat with them.

sticker-picker.failed-to-send-sticker: Failed to send sticker: No chat selected

messages.delete-message-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
messages.failed-to-delete-message: Failed to delete message: No chat selected
messages.failed-to-decrypt-message-by-owner: Failed to decrypt message by chat owner @{username} Something is wrong with your key.
messages.failed-to-decrypt-message: Failed to decrypt, you or the other user might have a wrong chat key. If you are unsure please ask the chat owner, they always have the correct key.

chat-owner.user-no-longer-verified: User @{username} is no longer verified. This can happen if they had to regenerate their public key. You need to re-verify with them before rotating the chat key.
chat-owner.users-no-longer-verified: Users {usernames} are  no longer verified. This can happen if they had to regenerate their public key. You need to re-verify with them before rotating the chat key.

chats.failed-to-select-chat: Failed to select chat, make sure you are online.
chats.failed-to-decrypt-chat-key:
Failed to decrypt chat key, you might have entered a wrong master key. 
(Error: {error})
chats.failed-to-get-encrypted-chat-keys-from-p: Failed to get chat key from public key. Try restarting the App or leaving the chat and re-joining if the problem persists.
Failed to get chat key from public key: Key Version mismatch. Try restarting the App or leaving the chat and re-joining if the problem persists.
Failed to get chat key from public key:

master-key.generate-new-warning: You will no longer have access to your current chats and stickers, only new ones created after re-generating your master key.
master-key.no-master-key-found: Could not find your maser key.

key-pair.public-key-integrity-error:
Public key integrity check failed!
Your public key stored in the database does no longer match the one generated by your device.
Either the master key on this device is wrong, something corrupted or someone tampered with the database.
key-pair.re-generate-key-pair-confirm: After re-generating your public key when you create a new chat or want to join one you will need to re-verify with the other users.
key-pair.re-generate-key-pair-success:
Your key pair has been regenerated.
When you create a new chat or want to join one you will need to re-verify with the other users.

emoji-verification.verify-user: Verify @{username}, make sure the emojis match

add-user-to-chat.failed-to-get-key: Failed to get chat key so cannot be shared with users.
add-user-to-chat.failed-to-decrypt-key: Failed to decrypt chat key so cannot be shared with users.

profile.you-are-admin: You are Admin of this Server
profile.change-confirm: This will log all your other devices out and you will need to re-share the master key with them.
profile.logout-confirm-content: Are you sure you want to logout?

appearance.preview-message-2: This is what a message looks like!

sessions.logout-confirm: Are you sure you want to logout this device?

sticker-importer.stickers-failed: Failed to select {count} stickers that where larger than 1MB or the wrong format

sticker-editor.removing-background-description: This may take a while depending on your device
sticker-editor.download-model-confirm: This will download an around 80MB model, so it may take a while. Also keep in mind that in browser background removal will be slow. You might want to use an external sticker creator app and import the .webp file. Do you want to proceed?

key-sharer.select-mode-import-content: What do you want to use for importing the key?
key-sharer.select-mode-export-content: What do you want to use for exporting/showing the key?
key-sharer.failed-to-generate-key: Failed to generate key from emoji sequence:
key-sharer.time-remaining: This Key will expire in {hours} hours and {minutes} minutes
